metadata.title: USN-6513-1 -- Python vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Python incorrectly handled certain plist files. If a user or an automated system were tricked into processing a specially crafted plist file, an attacker could possibly use this issue to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2022-48564)  It was discovered that Python instances of ssl.SSLSocket were vulnerable to a bypass of the TLS handshake. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications to treat unauthenticated received data before TLS handshake as authenticated data after TLS handshake. (CVE-2023-40217)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6513-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python2.7-dev - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 python2.7-doc - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 libpython2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 idle-python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 python2.7-examples - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 libpython2.7-dev - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 python2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm9 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro  libpython3.5-stdlib - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5-venv - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5-doc - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5-dev - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 libpython3.5-dev - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 libpython3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 idle-python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 libpython3.5-testsuite - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5-examples - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 python3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 libpython3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm12 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
